snippet: On Feb. 8, 1996, in a ceremony at the Library of Congress, President Bill Clinton signed the Telecommunications Act of 1996, saying it would "bring the future to our doorstep."
abstract: On Feb. 8, 1996, in a ceremony at the Library of Congress, President Bill Clinton signed the Telecommunications Act of 1996, saying it would "bring the future to our doorstep."

headline.main: Feb. 8, 1996 | President Clinton Signs Act to Overhaul Telecommunications Industry
